title: Boutique Adults-Only Island Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Escape to a boutique haven perched on the azure waters of Fiji's Beqa Island, where natural wonders sit right on your doorstep, at Lalati Resort & Spa. Nestled amid vibrant, untouched rainforest, this quintessential South Pacific stay offers private villas for ultimate romance and seclusion.

Your escape includes all-inclusive fresh and organic dining (daily breakfast, lunch and three-course dinner), a one-hour massage per person, return shared land and boat transfers, use of non-motorised watersport equipment and a bottle of wine on arrival.
